result.execSummary:
The defendant Kaprice Lee Edwards was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Kaprice Lee Edwards is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Kaprice Lee Edwards was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Kaprice Lee Edwards was found guilty of Intentionally Contact - Order for Misdemeanor Conviction, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.39.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: With any other sentence. Credit for 17 days time served.
Pay all costs, assessments and surcharges, DV surcharges, DNA surcharges by 08/04/16 or will be subject to civil judgment.
Consecutive to: To any other sentence.

charges.descr: Intentionally Contact - Order for Misdemeanor Conviction

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kaprice Lee Edwards

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Kaprice Lee Edwards in court with attorney Patrick Flanagan.  Defendant Kaprice Lee Edwards in custody.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Sentencing proceeded.   Victim has been notified and does not appear.  Certifications of Jefferson County matter filed and court takes judicial notice.  Statements to the court by parties.
AS to count 2:   The Court ordered the Defendant to serve 90 days in the House of Correction, concurrent with any other sentence with credit for 17 days time served.  
AS to count 3:  The Court ordered the Defendant to serve 7 months in the House of Correction, consecutive to any other sentence with credit for 0 days time served.  
The court orders the defendant to pay all costs, assessments and surcharges, DV surcharges, DNA surcharges by 8-4-2016 or will be subject to civil judgment.
Defendant is remanded.
FIled: Pretrial Credit; Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Defendant Kaprice Lee Edwards in court with attorney Patrick Flanagan.  Defendant Kaprice Lee Edwards in custody.  Sarra Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Clerk;ds

Case heard for Br. 04.

Defendant waives constitutional rights, enters a plea of GUILTY to Counts 2 & 3 and is examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum  received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the Complaint as a factual basis for judgment.  Court finds defendant guilty of Counts 2 & 3 as charged in the Information and enters a judgment of conviction.

On motion of the State, Court orders Count 1 DISMISSED.  

Per Chief Judge Directive of 15-10, parties are advised that effective August 3, 2015 this case will be assigned to Branch 38, Judge Jeffrey Wagner, in Room 504 of the Courthouse.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for August 4, 2015 at 08:15 am.
Due to defense counsel in trial on another case in Branch 44, case will be heard before Branch 44 at 1:15 pm, today's date for plea hearing for Branch 4.   mld

Attorney Patrick Flanagan in court, defendant Kaprice Lee Edwards not in court, in custody.  Sarra Mae Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Victim is present.  Parties are prepared to proceed to trial.  Case passed.   mld

Attorney Patrick Flanagan in court, defendant Kaprice Lee Edwards not in court, in custody.  Kristin M. Schrank appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Scheduling Conference held off the record.  Defense counsel has received discovery and offer.  Case is adjourned for Jury Trial in Branch 4 on 6-22-2015 at 8:30 am.  Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date, signed and filed.   mld

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with KAPRESHA E.
  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Kaprice Lee Edwards in court with attorney Adam c Essling.  Defendant Kaprice Lee Edwards in custody.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Flanagan, Branch 04.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 3, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
